short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with your support platform using Markprompt's AI platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Markprompt Agent Assist empowers customer support teams to streamline their workflows and enhance response quality.

With Agent Assist, your team can effortlessly:
- Extract Case Information: Instantly pull relevant case details to understand context at a glance.
- Draft Replies and Troubleshooting Procedures: Generate well-structured responses and guides agents to address customer issues faster.
- Analyze Sentiment, Urgency, and Customer Effort: Gain insights into the state of the interaction and prioritize urgent cases.
- Retrieve Related Articles: Find relevant knowledge base articles or similar cases, aiding quicker resolutions.
- Search Across Your Knowledge Base: Easily locate answers from your organizationâ€™s resources without leaving the platform.
